mapper.select: select t.card_type as cardType, t.card_name as cardName, t.logo_url as logoUrl, t.small_logo_url as smallLogoUrl, t.create_time as createTime, t.CARD_DETAIL as cardDetail, t.APPLI_MERCHANT as appliMerchant, t.CARD_FIELD as cardFiled, t.is_used as isUsed, t.attention as attention from T_CARD_LIST_INFO t where t.card_type=#{cardType}

select t.card_type as cardType, t.card_name as cardName, t.logo_url as logoUrl, t.small_logo_url as smallLogoUrl, t.create_time as createTime, t.CARD_DETAIL as cardDetail, t.APPLI_MERCHANT as appliMerchant, t.CARD_FIELD as cardFiled, t.is_used as isUsed, t.attention as attention from T_CARD_LIST_INFO t where t.is_used='0'
select t.CARD_NAME as cardName, t.CARD_TYPE as cardType, t.PRICE as cardBalance T_ACT_CARD_INFO t where t.IS_USED = '0'
